name: @umbraco-ui/uui-tag
description: Tag component from Umbraco UI components library. Comes in one shape, but different looks and sizes

scripts.build: npm run analyze && tsc --build --force && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.clean: tsc --build --clean && rimraf dist lib/**/*.js lib/**/*.js.map lib/**/*.d.ts custom-elements.json
